conclusion: To analyze how shadows A, B, C, and D will change when the light source moves, I'll examine what's creating each shadow and how shadows behave when light positions change.
There's a bulletin board/cork board with papers pinned to it (creating shadow C).
There appears to be a small object casting shadow A.
There's a postcard or envelope creating shadow B.
There's a white cylindrical object creating shadow D.

When a light source moves: 1. Shadows move in the opposite direction from the light 2. Shadows elongate when light moves lower or more to the side 3. Shadows shorten when light moves higher/more directly above 4. Shadows become larger when objects are farther from the surface
Shadow A will move toward the front right when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow A will elongate as the light source moves farther away at an angle when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow B will move toward the front right when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow B will elongate and may become more distorted when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow C will move toward the front right when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow C will elongate on the right side of the shadow when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow D will move toward the front right when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow D will elongate and may wrap more around the right side of the cylindrical object when the light source moves to the back left.
Shadow A will move toward the front left when the light source moves to the back right.
Shadow A will elongate as the light source moves farther away at an angle when the light source moves to the back right.
Shadow B will move toward the front left when the light source moves to the back right.
Shadow B will elongate and may become more distorted when the light source moves to the back right.
Shadow C will move toward the front left when the light source moves to the back right.
Shadow C will elongate on the left side of the shadow when the light source moves to the back right.
Shadow D will move toward the front left when the light source moves to the back right.
